content.raw:
Should we also update some of the examples and plugins?

```
caguero@bb9:~/workspace/ign-launch$ rgrep launch0 | grep -v log | grep -v build | grep -v Binary | grep -v hg
src/CMakeLists.txt:# Ex: cmdlaunch0.rb
src/CMakeLists.txt:# Ex: cmdlaunch0.rb
src/CMakeLists.txt:# Ex: launch0.yaml
examples/factory.ign:    filename="libignition-launch0-gazebo-factory.so">
examples/websocket.ign:          filename="libignition-launch0-websocket-server.so">
examples/plugins.ign:          filename="libignition-launch0-joystick.so">
examples/plugins.ign:          filename="libignition-launch0-joytotwist.so">
examples/plugins.ign:          filename="libignition-launch0-joytotwist.so">
examples/gazebo_plugins.ign:          filename="libignition-launch0-joystick.so">
examples/gazebo_plugins.ign:          filename="libignition-launch0-joytotwist.so">
examples/gazebo_plugins.ign:          filename="libignition-launch0-joytotwist.so">
examples/gazebo_plugins.ign:          filename="libignition-launch0-gazebo.so">
examples/gazebo_plugins.ign:          filename="libignition-launch0-gazebogui.so">
plugins/gazebo_factory/GazeboFactory.hh:    ///          filename="libignition-launch0-gazebo-factory.so">
plugins/gazebo_gui/GazeboGui.hh:    ///           filename="libignition-launch0-gazebogui.so">
plugins/gazebo_server/GazeboServer.hh:    ///         filename="libignition-launch0-gazebo.so">
```

Should we also update some of the examples and plugins?
